title: Spirit Farmer - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   Seinen   Slice of Life
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Beast Companions   Cute Children   Farming   Male Protagonist   Pets
author: 수색영장
description:
A down and outer Lee Geon Woo, returns to his hometown after spending his youth running after a dream, that never came true.

Losing hope in his life, he begins his new life as a farmer…….But suddenly, one day, a little girl appears………..Hawaaaaa…… and changes his life to one filled with lot of hope and joy.>
